title: 1977 (S.I. No. 30 of 1977) (as adapted by the Communications, Climate Action
heading: 1. Details of number of fish caught in last 3 salmon fishing seasons
text_raw:
1. Details of number of fish caught in last 3 salmon fishing seasons 

 
 
 
 4 [81] 

(a) 

(b) 

If you held a salmon net fishing licence for any of the last 3 
salmon fishing seasons, indicate in the table below the year or 
years in which you held the licence and the numbers of fish 
caught. Alternatively, you may tick the box at the top of the 
table for the number of fish caught and IFI will enter these 
details onto the form from your logbook returns during those 
years. 

If you have not held a salmon net fishing licence for any of the 
last 3 salmon fishing seasons, but were authorised and named on 
a licence held by another person, complete the table below 
giving appropriate details of the licence holder and the number 
of fish caught. 

Table 

Please tick if you wish these 
details to be taken from your 
logbook returns. 

( ) 

Year Licence holder or authorised 

person 

(Please state which) 

Number 
salmon caught 

of 

Number of sea 
trout 
over 
40cm caught 

1 

2 

3

Witness*

*Note: The signature of the applicant for a fishing licence must be witnessed 
by either a Peace Commissioner, Clergyman, Fishery Officer, or member of the 
Garda Síochána in whose fishery district the applicant resides. The latest date 
for receipt of completed application forms is 4 April 2024 at 5:00 p.m. 
Completed application forms should be sent to: 

River Basin District Director, 

Inland Fisheries Ireland
